quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: Unity is strength... when there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved.
name: Mattie Stepanek

quote: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
name: Buddha

quote: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.
name: George Orwell

quote: The undertaking of a new action brings new strength.
name: Richard L. Evans

quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: My family is my strength and my weakness.
name: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.
name: Helen Keller

quote: There are dark shadows on the earth, but its lights are stronger in the contrast.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself.
name: Laurence Sterne

quote: Being glamorous is about strength and confidence. It's black and white - dramatic. You have to be strong.
name: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quote: Kites rise highest against the wind - not with it.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Silence is a source of great strength.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Joy is prayer; joy is strength: joy is love; joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go.
name: Hermann Hesse

quote: The world is the great gymnasium where we come to make ourselves strong.
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Try to look at your weakness and convert it into your strength. That's success.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Endurance is not just the ability to bear a hard thing, but to turn it into glory.
name: William Barclay

quote: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.
name: Confucius

quote: Anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strength.
name: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Strength lies in differences, not in similarities.
name: Stephen Covey

quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
name: Betty Friedan

quote: The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it.
name: Woodrow Wilson

quote: Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: One who gains strength by overcoming obstacles possesses the only strength which can overcome adversity.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Sometimes the strength of motherhood is greater than natural laws.
name: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Our diversity is our strength. What a dull and pointless life it would be if everyone was the same.
name: Angelina Jolie

quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: You can't really be strong until you see a funny side to things.
name: Ken Kesey

quote: Only the weak are cruel. Gentleness can only be expected from the strong.
name: Leo Buscaglia

quote: A truly strong person does not need the approval of others any more than a lion needs the approval of sheep.
name: Vernon Howard

quote: Social media is reducing social barriers. It connects people on the strength of human values, not identities.
name: Narendra Modi

quote: God has always given me the strength to say what is right.
name: Rosa Parks

quote: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength.
name: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you.
name: Mike Murdock

quote: This is no time for ease and comfort. It is time to dare and endure.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: The strength of brand loyalty begins with how your product makes people feel.
name: Jay Samit

quote: If you would know strength and patience, welcome the company of trees.
name: Hal Borland

quote: I like criticism. It makes you strong.
name: LeBron James

quote: Thousands have lived without love, not one without water.
name: W. H. Auden

quote: The soul that is within me no man can degrade.
name: Frederick Douglass

quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Every good citizen adds to the strength of a nation.
name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: A single twig breaks, but the bundle of twigs is strong.
name: Tecumseh

quote: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty.
name: John Ruskin

quote: There is strength in numbers, but organizing those numbers is one of the great challenges.
name: John C. Mather

quote: It doesn't take a lot of strength to hang on. It takes a lot of strength to let go.
name: J. C. Watts

quote: The strong man is the one who is able to intercept at will the communication between the senses and the mind.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Our ability to handle life's challenges is a measure of our strength of character.
name: Les Brown

quote: Climbing to the top demands strength, whether it is to the top of Mount Everest or to the top of your career.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Fortitude is the marshal of thought, the armor of the will, and the fort of reason.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: The men who learn endurance, are they who call the whole world, brother.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow. It empties today of its strength.
name: Corrie Ten Boom

quote: A strong woman is a woman determined to do something others are determined not be done.
name: Marge Piercy

quote: Insincerity is always weakness; sincerity even in error is strength.
name: George Henry Lewes

quote: Patience and time do more than strength or passion.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: There is little that can withstand a man who can conquer himself.
name: Louis XIV

quote: You have been chosen, and you must therefore use such strength and heart and wits as you have.
name: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: We draw our strength from the very despair in which we have been forced to live. We shall endure.
name: Cesar Chavez

quote: I know and I've always felt for Canada that we recognize that diversity is a great source of strength.
name: Justin Trudeau

quote: Physical strength can never permanently withstand the impact of spiritual force.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Don't expect to build up the weak by pulling down the strong.
name: Calvin Coolidge

quote: We gain the strength of the temptation we resist.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Even cowards can endure hardship; only the brave can endure suspense.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Difficulties are meant to rouse, not discourage. The human spirit is to grow strong by conflict.
name: William Ellery Channing

quote: I realized that my strength was being different.
name: Betsey Johnson

quote: It takes strength to make your way through grief, to grab hold of life and let it pull you forward.
name: Patti Davis

quote: Life is very interesting... in the end, some of your greatest pains, become your greatest strengths.
name: Drew Barrymore

quote: Dealing with depression effectively is a mark not of weakness, but of strength.
name: Andrew Solomon

quote: Thank you to all for your prayers and good wishes. It gave me the strength to persevere and warmed my heart.
name: Steven Cojocaru

quote: Women are like teabags. We don't know our true strength until we are in hot water!
name: Unknown

quote: As long as we persevere and endure, we can get anything we want.
name: Mike Tyson

quote: Problems are not the problem; coping is the problem.
name: Virginia Satir

quote: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal. My strength lies solely in my tenacity.
name: Louis Pasteur

quote: Believing in yourself and having confidence gives you outer strength.
name: Nikki Bella

quote: Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others.
name: Samuel Smiles

quote: The perfection of Christian character depends wholly upon the grace and strength found alone in God.
name: Ellen G. White

quote: My greatest strength as a consultant is to be ignorant and ask a few questions.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: Every calamity is to be overcome by endurance.
name: Virgil

quote: Tears shed for self are tears of weakness, but tears shed for others are a sign of strength.
name: Billy Graham

quote: Strength of mind rests in sobriety; for this keeps your reason unclouded by passion.
name: Pythagoras

quote: Nothing has more strength than dire necessity.
name: Euripides

quote: Calm, open debate, and logical thought drive strength to its maximum effectiveness.
name: Billy Corgan

quote: A powerful idea communicates some of its strength to him who challenges it.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: Victoria's Secret is really about celebrating women and what they stand for: the strength.
name: Cara Delevingne

quote: Yoga is equal parts strength, flexibility, balance, and endurance.
name: Mandy Ingber

quote: The colour of the skin is in no way connected with strength of the mind or intellectual powers.
name: Benjamin Banneker

quote: When restraint and courtesy are added to strength, the latter becomes irresistible.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: When you're playing upside down, it takes twice the strength.
name: Tommy Lee

quote: Fortitude is the guard and support of the other virtues.
name: John Locke

quote: We need a president with tremendous intelligence, smarts, cunning, strength and stamina.
name: Donald Trump

quote: If one suffers we all suffer. Togetherness is strength. Courage.
name: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

quote: Work is not man's punishment. It is his reward and his strength and his pleasure.
name: George Sand

quote: I know that, like every woman of the people, I have more strength than I appear to have.
name: Evita Peron

quote: Rudeness is a weak imitation of strength.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: As long as I have health and strength, I will gladly work all my days.
name: Frederic Chopin

quote: Peace is purchased from strength. It's not purchased from weakness or unilateral retreats.
name: Benjamin Netanyahu

quote: The strength and power of a country depends absolutely on the quantity of good men and women in it.
name: John Ruskin

quote: My strength and my weakness are twins in the same womb.
name: Marge Piercy

quote: I bring a lot of energy and passion to what I do. Plus, I've had some weird feats of superhuman strength!
name: John Cena

quote: When I use my strength in the service of my vision it makes no difference whether or not I am afraid.
name: Audre Lorde

quote: Power over others is weakness disguised as strength.

quote: Women may fall when there's no strength in men.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Heroism is endurance for one moment more.
name: George F. Kennan

quote: Faith gives you an inner strength and a sense of balance and perspective in life.
name: Gregory Peck

quote: Tolerance is a virtue that depends upon peace and strength.
name: Charles Lindbergh

quote: This is the mark of a really admirable man: steadfastness in the face of trouble.
name: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: There are two ways of exerting one's strength: one is pushing down, the other is pulling up.
name: Booker T. Washington

quote: Life is truly known only to those who suffer, lose, endure adversity and stumble from defeat to defeat.
name: Anais Nin

quote: Power is so characteristically calm, that calmness in itself has the aspect of strength.
name: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: The kind of beauty I want most is the hard-to-get kind that comes from within - strength, courage, dignity.
name: Ruby Dee

quote: My bad habits aren't my title. My strengths and my talent are my title.
name: Layne Staley

quote: Nobody picks on a strong man.
name: Charles Atlas

quote: My strength is as the strength of ten, because my heart is pure.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Good composition is like a suspension bridge - each line adds strength and takes none away.
name: Robert Henri

quote: Atheism shows strength of mind, but only to a certain degree.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: My fitness instructor helped me with strength training, muscle building, and toning.
name: Karan Patel

quote: What is a superhero? They're supposed to represent hope, opportunity, and strength for everybody.

quote: Running up a steep hill or up steps are fantastic ways of building explosive strength.

quote: I have the people behind me and the people are my strength.
name: Huey Newton

quote: 'Tis skill, not strength, that governs a ship.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: Being vulnerable is not a sign of weakness. It's a sign of strength.
name: Karamo Brown

quote: It takes strength to be kind; it's not a weakness.
name: Daniel Lubetzky

quote: You don't have to be a bodybuilder to have strength in your muscles.
name: Katarina Johnson-Thompson

quote: I don't believe in cutting out people from the past. It doesn't give strength; it just gives loneliness.
name: Carla Bruni

quote: My strength was that I am more balanced and calmer than most other riders.
name: Miguel Indurain

quote: The awareness of our own strength makes us modest.
name: Paul Cezanne

quote: He knows not his own strength who hath not met adversity.
name: William Samuel Johnson

quote: We get strength and encouragement from watching children.
name: Hayao Miyazaki

quote: True strength is delicate.
name: Louise Berliawsky Nevelson

quote: Sometimes your greatest strength can emerge as a weakness if the context changes.
name: Harsha Bhogle

quote: Each particular society begins to feel its strength, whence arises a state of war between different nations.
name: Montesquieu

quote: A strength to harm is perilous in the hand of an ambitious head.
name: Elizabeth I

quote: The only thing I pray for is the strength to go out without complaining.
name: Tiny Tim

quote: Virtue is an inner strength. It expands your nature.
name: John Bradshaw

quote: We are a grassroots party. We always have been. That's been the strength of the GOP.
name: Michael Steele

quote: For me, my greatest weakness is also my greatest strength: I'm a complete overthinker about everything.

quote: I like a women who's got some balls, some strength. As long as I can beat her at arm wrestling, that's fine.

quote: If I had not some strength of will I would make a first class drunkard.

quote: My mother was the strength. She was the anchor. She was a preacher and a teacher.
name: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf

quote: I had always been proud of my body - its strength and grace enabled me to pursue my passions.
name: Misty Copeland

quote: Discipline and united action are the real source of strength for the nation.
name: Lal Bahadur Shastri

quote: Sure I am of this, that you have only to endure to conquer.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: When a tradition gathers enough strength to go on for centuries, you don't just turn it off one day.

quote: Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.
name: Liane Cordes

quote: I don't have the strength or wisdom to get through a single day without guidance and grace from God.
name: Tony Dungy

quote: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: He who conquers others is strong; He who conquers himself is mighty.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Only the gentle are ever really strong.
name: James Dean

quote: Perhaps I am stronger than I think.
name: Thomas Merton

quote: The wisest use of American strength is to advance freedom.
name: George W. Bush

quote: It is my own firm belief that the strength of the soul grows in proportion as you subdue the flesh.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The strength of the vampire is that people will not believe in him.
name: Garrett Fort

quote: We - we need strength, we need energy, we need quickness and we need brain in this country to turn it around.

quote: The strength of a man's virtue should not be measured by his special exertions, but by his habitual acts.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: Living in America and, of course, just being women in general, we've got more strength than we think we do.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: It is only necessary to have courage, for strength without self-confidence is useless.

quote: The transfer of power is always a test of the constitutional system, a test of its strength.
name: Vladimir Putin

quote: The strength and power of despotism consists wholly in the fear of resistance.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: I think people who have good parents come into the world with a strength, yes, and an advantage.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: A key to strengthening spiritual muscles and enduring hardship is finding strength in the Word of God.
name: Walter Martin

quote: Only strength can cooperate. Weakness can only beg.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: When strength is yoked with justice, where is a mightier pair than they?
name: Aeschylus

quote: Suppressed grief suffocates, it rages within the breast, and is forced to multiply its strength.
name: Ovid

quote: In all my perplexities and distresses, the Bible has never failed to give me light and strength.

quote: America's greatest strength has always been its hopeful vision of human progress.
name: John McCain

quote: My emotions are usually my weakness, but they are my strength while acting.
name: Amruta Khanvilkar

quote: Where is the man who has the strength to be true, and to show himself as he is?

quote: When I make a fist, it's strong, and you can't tear it apart. As long as there's unity, there's strength.

quote: Indian democracy's greatest strength is that we have always put the nation above politics.
name: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quote: Freedom comes from strength and self-reliance.
name: Lisa Murkowski

quote: I think that we should remember that social change can happen when people join together with some strength.

quote: My strength is translating emotion because I'm such a feeler.
name: Selena Gomez

quote: It's empowering to find a workout that builds strength and grace.

quote: I find it takes a lot of strength to endure myself.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: The strength of criticism lies in the weakness of the thing criticized.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: We all have enough strength to endure the misfortunes of others.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: What is important is to believe in something so strongly that you're never discouraged.
name: Salma Hayek

quote: Academics don't normally manage to alter people's way of thinking through their strength of argument.

quote: I know there is strength in the differences between us. I know there is comfort where we overlap.
name: Ani DiFranco

quote: Wisdom is the knowledge of good and evil, not the strength to choose between the two.
name: John Cheever

quote: They say everything you go through in your childhood builds character and inner strength.
name: Curtis Joseph

quote: He is greatest whose strength carries up the most hearts by the attraction of his own.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Strong and bitter words indicate a weak cause.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Wisdom is always an overmatch for strength.
name: Phil Jackson

quote: Patience is the support of weakness; impatience the ruin of strength.

quote: I was ironing my own clothes when I was 11 years old. My mental strength goes back to those days.
name: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: Many a man's strength is in opposition, and when he faileth, he grows out of use.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Strength does not have to be belligerent and loud.
name: Russell Brand

quote: People don't understand the power of love and family and strength.
name: Paul Pierce

quote: In the end, long life is the reward, strength, and beauty.
name: Grace Paley

quote: Pilates has been the perfect solution to maintaining strength and vitality in my life.
name: Trudie Styler

quote: It isn't right to judge strength as better than good wisdom.
name: Xenophanes

quote: Diversity of thought and culture and religion and ideas has been the strength of America.
name: Gary Locke

quote: The great and admirable strength of America consists in this, that America is truly the American people.
name: Jacques Maritain

quote: It does not take much strength to do things, but it requires great strength to decide on what to do.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Success in golf depends less on strength of body than upon strength of mind and character.
name: Arnold Palmer

quote: I count life just a stuff to try the soul's strength on.
name: Robert Browning

quote: I never won anything by myself. I was always strong because of help that gave me extra strength to win.
name: Dan Gable

quote: People do not lack strength; they lack will.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: You can tell the strength of a nation by the women behind its men.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Peace is not the absence of war, but a virtue based on strength of character.
name: Baruch Spinoza

quote: I learned that it is the weak who are cruel, and that gentleness is to be expected only from the strong.
name: Leo Rosten

quote: Life asks not merely what you can do; it asks how much can you endure and not be spoiled.
name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: Above all, it is not decency or goodness of gentleness that impresses the Middle East, but strength.
name: Meir Kahane

quote: Physical strength in a woman - that's what I am.
name: Tina Turner

quote: Strength and wisdom are not opposing values.
name: William J. Clinton

quote: I have both English bulldog determination and Bengal tiger strength.
name: Bikram Choudhury

quote: Force has no place where there is need of skill.
name: Herodotus

quote: The mark of a truly civilized man is confidence in the strength and security derived from the inquiring mind.
name: Felix Frankfurter

quote: Endure and persist; this pain will turn to good by and by.
name: Ovid

quote: I have always drawn strength from being close to home.
name: Arthur Ashe

quote: I'm not sure I have the physical strength to undertake a novel.
name: Joan Didion

quote: I had a vision with which I might have saved my people, but I had not the strength to do it.
name: Black Elk

quote: My strength would be my honesty and my passion towards my work.
name: Sushant Singh Rajput

quote: Strengthen me by sympathizing with my strength, not my weakness.

quote: If we resist our passions, it is more due to their weakness than our strength.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: The strength of the Democratic Party of Cook County is not something that just happened.
name: Richard J. Daley

quote: There is a growing strength in women but it's in the forehead, not the forearm.
name: Beverly Sills

quote: I feel my heart break to see a nation ripped apart by it's own greatest strength - it's diversity.
name: Melissa Etheridge

quote: The strength of any weakness within us is the degree to which it is feared.
name: Guy Finley

quote: Wisdom we know is the knowledge of good and evil, not the strength to choose between the two.
name: John Cheever

quote: From the gut comes the strut, and where hunger reigns, strength abstains.
name: Francois Rabelais

quote: China has been developing, growing in economic strength and its influence in the region. That will continue.
name: Lee Hsien Loong

quote: Better than the strength of men and horses is our wisdom.
name: Xenophanes

quote: The first movement ballerina should be a paradigm of strength and authority.
name: Robert Gottlieb

quote: We deceive ourselves when we fancy that only weakness needs support. Strength needs it far more.
name: Sophie Swetchine

quote: I gambled on having the strength to live two lives, one for myself and one for the world.
name: Ruth Benedict

quote: Strength and compassion are not mutually exclusive.
name: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The glimpses of human strength and frailty that a physician sees are with me still.
name: Daniel Nathans

quote: Darts players are probably a lot fitter than most footballers in overall body strength.
name: Sid Waddell

quote: The source of my power and strength is God, and I know it, without a shadow of a doubt.
name: Derek Fisher

quote: I like form and shape and strength in pictures.
name: Herb Ritts

quote: When you love someone deeply, you give strength, and when you are loved deeply, you gain courage.
name: Scott Cook

quote: I gain strength from postive thought and from the daily conversation with God.
name: Ottmar Hitzfeld

quote: Not one man in a thousand has the strength of mind or the goodness of heart to be an atheist.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: My mom has always been so generous and so sensitive and so vulnerable and yet exudes so much strength.
name: Justin Trudeau

quote: The spirit of man can endure only so much and when it is broken only a miracle can mend it.
name: John Burroughs

quote: The sea heaves up, hangs loaded o'er the land, Breaks there, and buries its tumultuous strength.
name: Robert Browning

quote: All women are the same, really: They are strong, but they are afraid of their own strength.
name: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: A nation will rise no higher than the strength of its homes.
name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: One has to have the strength of character to say the time has come to move on... unless you are a king.
name: Kofi Annan

quote: It is a maudlin and indecent verity that comes out through the strength of wine.
name: Joseph Conrad

quote: Tina Turner is someone that I admire, because she made her strength feminine and sexy.
name: Beyonce Knowles

quote: I wish I was a gorgeous mixologist, but that was not my god-given strength.
name: Jonathan Van Ness

quote: Life only demands from you the strength that you possess. Only one feat is possible; not to run away.
name: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: To be loved is a strength. To love is a weakness.
name: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: I believe in prayer. It's the best way we have to draw strength from heaven.
name: Josephine Baker

quote: I realized then that the generations may change but the strength of our nation remains solid.
name: Jane D. Hull

quote: Our strength is often composed of the weakness that we're damned if we're going to show.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Religion brings to man an inner strength, spiritual light, and ineffable peace.
name: Alexis Carrel

quote: Organized religion is a sham and a crutch for weak-minded people who need strength in numbers.

quote: Thankfully, I was given a strong base by my parents, an understanding of who I was and my strength.
name: Kimberly Elise

quote: Strength of character may be learned at work, but beauty of character is learned at home.
name: Henry Drummond

quote: You're blessed if you have the strength to work.
name: Mahalia Jackson

quote: I was always fascinated by strength. Arnold was an idol of mine.
name: Brock Lesnar

quote: I'm an activist for gay marriage equality and children's rights. I'm the face of Share Our Strength.
name: Sandra Lee

quote: Farrah Fawcett had courage, she had strength, and she had faith.
name: Jaclyn Smith

quote: My faith, my family, my friends - that's where I get my strength.
name: Dana Loesch

quote: I haven't strength of mind not to need a career.
name: Ruth Benedict

quote: I used to play rugby, which requires a lot of physical strength. The game requires you to get aggressive.
name: Sidharth Malhotra

quote: A robust economy is a source of national strength for Japan.
name: Shinzo Abe

quote: My strength is my enthusiasm.
name: Placido Domingo

quote: Strength doesn't mean an absence of pain.
name: Aja Naomi King

quote: The joy of the mind is the measure of its strength.
name: Ninon de L'Enclos

quote: It gives one hope, this great strength of Africa.
name: Stephen Lewis

quote: I am climbing a difficult road; but the glory gives me strength.
name: Sextus Propertius

quote: I believe my past is my strength.
name: Michel Martelly

quote: I had the strength and the finesse there and put it all together.
name: Elvis Stojko

quote: A champion's strength comes from never being contented.
name: Stephan El Shaarawy

quote: What is called a sincere work is one that is endowed with enough strength to give reality to an illusion.
name: Max Jacob

quote: What is to give light must endure burning.
name: Anton Wildgans

quote: Courage conquers all things: it even gives strength to the body.
name: Ovid

quote: I kid around a lot, but pranks are not my best strength!

quote: Have you not learned that strength comes to an ordinary soul when given an extraordinary calling?
name: Russell M. Nelson

quote: The strength of America is not in Washington.
name: J. C. Watts

quote: On the world stage, Donald Trump will lead from strength.
name: Mike Pence

quote: Strength instead of being the lusty child of passion, grows by grappling with and subduing them.
name: James M. Barrie

quote: I want people to draw strength from me.
name: Mr. T

quote: I've been through it all, baby, I'm mother courage.
name: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: The lack of financial strength to avail healthcare is a major challenge.
name: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quote: If I had to pick my greatest strength as a football coach, I say it would be innovation.
name: Tom Landry

quote: I've been doing a lot of drama, but I feel like comedy is my strength.
name: Taraji P. Henson

quote: When people are depending on us, we end up finding strength we didn't know we had.
name: Adam Grant

quote: Love you will find only where you may show yourself weak without provoking strength.
name: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: For my first fragrance, I wanted to capture the essence of a woman's strength and beauty.
name: Ivanka Trump

quote: Freedom and order are not incompatible... truth is strength... free discussion is the very life of truth.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: In the strength of the Lord we can do and endure and overcome all things.
name: David A. Bednar

quote: I'm coming from a place of total strength and humility now.
name: Robert Downey, Jr.

quote: As a student, I was more gifted in history and geography. Things like arithmetic were not my strength.
name: Hubert de Givenchy

quote: I get strength from my art - all the paintings I own are powerful.
name: Madonna Ciccone

quote: He knows not his own strength that hath not met adversity.
name: Cesare Pavese

quote: Will power is only the tensile strength of one's own disposition. One cannot increase it by a single ounce.
name: Cesare Pavese

quote: Our passion is our strength.
name: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: I have two beautiful children. And they really are my strength.
name: Terri Irwin

quote: He knows not his own strength that has not met adversity.
name: Ben Jonson

quote: Credulity is the man's weakness, but the child's strength.
name: Charles Lamb

quote: I think that I have a sensitivity toward people, and that is a strength.
name: Joe Torre

quote: Strength is leading when you just don't want to lead.
name: Stanley A. McChrystal

quote: America needs a big idea that plays to its strength. It should look to national service.
name: Stanley A. McChrystal

quote: In Europe, we see the underlying strength of the economy, especially in southern European countries.
name: Alain Dehaze

quote: A man has to have sensibility, wit, mystery, tolerance, and strength... Romance also helps.
name: Carolina Herrera

quote: We are a long time in learning that all our strength and salvation is in God.
name: David Brainerd

quote: Every burden is a blessing.
name: Walt Kelly

quote: God grant you the strength to fight off the temptations of surrender.
name: Walter Annenberg

quote: It takes enormous strength to be a real woman.
name: John Eldredge

quote: In my heart of hearts, I'm a character actress, whereas other people play their one strength.
name: Juliette Lewis

quote: My parents, especially my mother, has been my pillar of strength.
name: Sangram Singh

quote: The strength of your company is how wide a variety of people can be successful in it.
name: Mark Pincus

quote: Peace through strength works; but the flip side is war invited by weakness.
name: Pete Hegseth

quote: The strength of fiction is not in reading about yourself, but in reading about other people.
name: Tom Rachman

quote: I've been doing a lot of deadlifting and squatting for overall strength.
name: Jesse Lee Soffer

quote: Sometimes your disappointments make you a stronger person for the future.
name: Blanka Vlasic

quote: I say my greatest strength is my speed, and I think that I could use some work on my concentration.
name: Jacoby Jones
